Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution

Class FhirpathEvaluators

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution.FhirpathEvaluators
public class FhirpathEvaluators extends Object
Utility class for creating FhirpathEvaluator instances.

This class provides factory methods and factory classes for creating evaluators that work with single resource types. The createSingle(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Enumerations.ResourceType, ca.uhn.fhir.context.FhirContext, au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.function.registry.FunctionRegistry, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.collection.Collection>, au.csiro.pathling.io.source.DataSource) method creates an evaluator for working with a single resource type, whilst the FhirpathEvaluators.SingleEvaluatorFactory and FhirpathEvaluators.SingleEvaluatorProvider classes provide reusable factory instances for creating evaluators with specific configurations.

  • Method Details

    • createSingle

      @Nonnull public static FhirpathEvaluator createSingle(@Nonnull Enumerations.ResourceType subjectResource, @Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull FunctionRegistry functionRegistry, @Nonnull Map<String,Collection> variables, @Nonnull DataSource dataSource)
      Creates a single resource evaluator.

      This evaluator is designed for evaluating FHIRPath expressions against a single resource type without complex joins. It's the most common evaluator for simple queries.

      Use this evaluator when:

      • Working with a single resource type (e.g., Patient)
      • Not requiring complex joins between different resource types
      • Performing simple attribute access and filtering operations
      Parameters:
      subjectResource - the subject resource type (e.g., Patient, Observation)
      fhirContext - the FHIR context for FHIR model operations
      functionRegistry - the registry of FHIRPath functions to use during evaluation
      variables - the variables available during FHIRPath evaluation
      dataSource - the data source containing the resources to query
      Returns:
      a new FhirpathEvaluator configured for single resource evaluation
